Posts.Content: Mar 7, 2018 07:51PM - edited Mar 7, 2018 08:00PM by Mimi321 Hi all, this month I am a 15 year survivor! I had aggressive stage 3, hormone positive bc. I had all the treatments, mastectomy, chemo, radiation and hormonal. It was tough, but I made it and happy and thankful to be here!
Posts.Title: Stage III Cancer Survivors...15+ years and out weesa lexi4
